Cartwright == Cartwright
Adams, Bernard == Adams, Bernard
Empty == Empty
Adams == Adams
Adams, Eamonn == Adams, Eamonn
Adams == Adams
Adams, Eamonn, Denver == Adams, Denver, Eamonn
Empty == Empty again!

2 doctors in surgery.
First is Adams.
Last is Cartwright.
Random seed = 1
A random doctor: Adams

It's to late. Everyone has gone home.
Dr Adams and Dr Bernard are having a loud argument in one corner.
Dr Adams and Dr Bernard are having a hushed argument in one corner.
At least Adams and Bernard aren't arguing.
Dr Eamonn is polishing his glasses.
Nope, Adams and Bernard are here.
All the doctors (5): Adams, Bernard, Cartwright, Denver, Eamonn
All the doctors again: Adams, Bernard, Cartwright, Denver, Eamonn
Adams here!
